## Get started in minutes

<Steps>
  <Step>Download & Extract</Step>
  Extract the portfolio-pro.zip file to your desired location.
  
  ```bash
  unzip portfolio-pro.zip && cd portfolio-pro
  ```

  <Step>Install Dependencies</Step>
  Install all required packages using your preferred package manager.
  
  ```bash
  pnpm install
  ```

  <Step>Configure Environment</Step>
  Set up your environment variables for CMS and third-party integrations.
  
  ```bash
  cp .env.example .env.local
  ```

  <Step>Launch Development Server</Step>
  Start the development server and see your portfolio come to life.
  
  ```bash
  pnpm dev
  ```
  
  Visit `http://localhost:3000` to see your portfolio in action.
</Steps>
